MajorClaims.MC1: a defeated person has to try and try until to achieve her or his goal
MajorClaims.MC2: people should not give up when they face with a failure

Claims.C1: they have to learn new points from that failure, and they become more experienced
Claims.C2: when people face with a failure they can learn a large number of things from that failure, therefore in the next effort they try to avoid doing and repeating that mistakes
Claims.C3: experience shows while people doing a job constantly, they become more experienced in that subject, so in the final effort they become successful with the high percentile

Premises.P2: scientists experiment a substance for a long time, after they gain lots of experience and knowledge about that subject they decide to make it final
